Dialogue: My sweet boy, where have you gone? How could you do this to us?
Please come back, it is dangerous out there! Oh you poor thing, all alone out there. We have always loved you, Hughie, always! How could you rather be by yourself?
Keeping your parents worried sick about you! Oh, how could you, Hughie?
He must have gone into the sewers, but the gate is locked and the gate release is all the way in the market.
